name: CCB Stuffed Dates
preparation: Preheat oven to 375Â° F. Line a Sheet Pan with a Sheet Pan Liner.
In bowl, combine cream cheese, mayo, and dip mix.
Cut a slit lengthwise in each date; remove pits. Fill each date with a heaping tsp of dip mix.
Place dates on pan; bake for 8 min or until warmed through.
Remove from oven; arrange on a platter. Drizzle with honey and top with slivered almonds or pomegranate seeds, if desired.
tips: Instead of honey, drizzle with good quality balsamic reduction.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Irresistible flavors of smoky bacon (plant-based), real Parmesan & chives.

products.name: Sheet Pan
